title: Psalms 124:1
text: IF it had not been the LORD who was on our side, now may Israel say;

title: Psalms 124:2
text: If it had not been the LORD who was on our side, when men rose up against us:

title: Psalms 124:3
text: Then they had swallowed us up quick, when their wrath was kindled against us:

title: Psalms 124:4
text: Then the waters had overwhelmed us, the stream had gone over our soul:

title: Psalms 124:5
text: Then the proud waters had gone over our soul.

title: Psalms 124:6
text: Blessed be the LORD, who hath not given us as a prey to their teeth.

title: Psalms 124:7
text: Our soul is escaped as a bird out of the snare of the fowlers: the snare is broken, and we are escaped.

title: Psalms 124:8
text: Our help is in the name of the LORD, who made heaven and earth.
